TEXT.English: Provided to all cities by the [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradition: Hunting[\LINK] which is built by a [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Great Hunter[\LINK]. Combines the [LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Master Hunter[\LINK] and [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTIONS]Hunting Instruction[\LINK] buildings.
TEXT.French: Disponible pour toutes les villes par la [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradition: Chasse[\LINK] qui est construit par un [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Chasseur Illustre[\LINK]. Combine à la fois les bâtiments [LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Maître Chasseur[\LINK] et [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTIONS]Instructions de Chasse[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Versieht alle Städte mit der [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradition: Jagt[\LINK] welche von einem [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Großer Jäger[\LINK]errichtet wird. Kombiniert die Gebäude[LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Meisterjäger[\LINK] und [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTIONS]Jagdanleitung[\LINK].
TEXT.Polish: Zapewniany do wszystkich miast przez [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradycje: £owiectwo[\LINK] która jest tworzona przez [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Wielkiego £owce[\LINK]. £¹czy [LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Wybitnego £owce[\LINK] i [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTIONS]Instrukcje £owieckie[\LINK] (budynki).
TEXT.Italian: Fornito a tutte le città dall'edificio [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradizione: Caccia[\LINK] che è costruito da un [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Grande Cacciatore[\LINK]. Combina [LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Mastro cacciatore[\LINK] e [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTION]Istruzioni di caccia[\LINK].
TEXT.Russian: Предоставляется всем городам [LINK=BUILDING_TRADITION_HUNTER]Tradition: Hunting[\LINK], которую строит [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_HUNTER]Great Hunter[\LINK]. Объединяет [LINK=BUILDING_MASTER_HUNTER]Master Hunter[\LINK] и [LINK=BUILDING_HUNTING_INSTRUCTIONS]Hunting Instruction[\LINK] здания.

TEXT.English: Only Great Hunters may become Master Hunters. Master Hunters are special versions of the normal hunter. They are much more likely to subdue animals so that the Food and Production returns from them are higher.
TEXT.French: Seuls les Grands Chasseurs peuvent devenir Maîtres Chasseurs. Les Maîtres Chasseurs sont des versions spéciales des chasseurs ordinaires. Ils ont beaucoup plus de chances de maîtriser les animaux, ce qui augmente les ressources en Nourriture et en Production qu'ils en retirent.
TEXT.Italian: Solo i grandi cacciatori possono diventare maestri cacciatori. I maestri cacciatori sono versioni speciali dei normali cacciatori. È molto più probabile che sottomettano gli animali e il ritorno di cibo e di produzione che procurano è maggiore.
TEXT.German: Nur Große Jäger können Meisterjäger werden. Meisterjäger sind spezielle Varianten des normalen Jägers. Es ist wesentlich wahrscheinlicher das sie Tiere bändigen, so das mehr Nahrung und Produktion von ihnen erzeugt wird.
TEXT.Polish: Tylko Wielcy £owcy mog¹ zostaæ Wybitnymi £owcami. Wybitni £owcy s¹ specjalna wersj¹ normalnych myœliwych. S¹ bardziej sprawni w ³apaniu zwierz¹t ¿ywcem.
TEXT.Russian: Только Великие охотники могут стать Мастерами-звероловами - особой версией обычного охотника. Они гораздо чаще подчиняют себе животных, чтобы получить от них больше пищи и производства.
